name: astro-poc-elrincondeebano
description: Side-by-side Astro migration proof of concept for ElRinconDeEbano.com

scripts.build: npm run data:sync && npx astro build && node scripts/postbuild-legacy-pages.mjs && node scripts/postbuild-sitemap.mjs && npm run assets:validate && npm run contract:http && npm run contract:artifacts
